```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)


# Input:

iris %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(aes(x = Sepal.Width))

```
# UI:

```{r}

selectInput("variable", label = "Elige tu variable",
              choices = c("Sepal.Length",
                          "Sepal.Width",
                          "Petal.Length" ,
                          "Petal.Width" ),
            selected = "Sepal.Length")
```

# Server:

```{r}

renderPlot({
  
  ggplot() +
    geom_histogram(aes(x = iris[[input$variable]]))
  
})

```

```{r}

renderDT({
  
  iris
  
})

```
